field.name: description
field.value:
Used to track work regarding .NET 4 security transparency and APTCA.
- Audit the codebase for security transparency, using SecAnnotate.exe - Attempt to run automated tests in medium trust.

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: As of https://github.com/castleproject/Castle.Windsor/commit/e6a35c58fb5418f237db29879111dd6f1f51af86 the build passes running SecAnnotate.exe

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: would be great if we could make secannotate part of our build on the build server...

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: anyway, I guess we can close it at this point
